Installation

PyFemtet supports the following requirements:

  • windows only

  • femtet 2023.0 or later (2024.0 or later recommended)

  • python >= 3.10 (>=3.11 is recommended)

See below for installation and setup instructions.

    1. Install Femtet

    1. Install Python

    1. Install PyFemtet

If step 3 fails, try the following additional steps:

  • a1. Manually Install PyFemtet

  • a2. Manually Enable Femtet Macro

  • a3. Manually Set COM Constants

If you want to check the installation, please follow the steps below.

  • Check the installation of Python

  • Check the installation of PyFemtet

Tip

For verification, we recommend that you first view the samples in Examples.
